name: Temporal Combat
description:
In Temporal combat  you will take control of a fighter pulled out of time and brawl until you are the last man standing. you have four lives, but due to warps in time you can switch between them. 

Controls on Xbox 360 controller:

A - Jump / Submit
B - Attack / Cancel
X/Y - Attack
Right Bumper - Next Shadow
Left Bumper - Previous Shadow
Left Stick - Move

Made by: 
Sid Fernandez - Programming / Particle effects / Shaders
Nick Hurst - Character Design / Art 
Timothy Wang - Programming / Sound Effects
Daniel Sarfati - Programming / Animations

For the IGDA San Diego 2017 Game Jam
